column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This is my favorite pan pizza
column2: and that's saying a lot when you live in Chicago!  My go-to is the Malnati Chicago Classic
column3: which features lean delicious sausage and extra mozzarella cheese topped with vine-ripened chunky tomato sauce
column4: all on a buttery yet crunchy crust.  That Pizza
column6: would make anyone happy as can be.  But take my advice and start with the Malnati Salad (Romaine lettuce
column10: Gorgonzola cheese) and for God's sake
column11: DO NOT forget to slather on the Sweet Vinaigrette
column12: made special in house.  It will blow your hair back
column14: and satisfy the bejeezus out of you.  Enjoy!!
